arts.ttl: Inter Milan New Boy Set For Debut Against Juventus But Chivu Has Doubts In Midfield
arts.sum: Inter Milan new boy Manuel Akanji is set to make his debut for the club against Juventus, with another summer signing, Petar Sucic, set to be benched. Akanji signed from Premier League club Manchester City on deadline day. He joined Inter on a season-long loan with a €15m buy option. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Lead Juventus In Club Value Derby d’Italia: ‘Gap Set To Widen’
arts.sum: The club value of Inter Milan has overtaken that of Juventus, with the gap only “set to widen.” In figures released by Football Benchmark through the Gazzetta dello Sport, Inter’s entire club is valued at €1.715 billion; Juventus sit at €1.651 million. The organisation calculate the estimate through five parameters.
